hideRollValue.name: Show 'Success' or 'Failure' Text
hideRollValue.hint: Shows a text indicating whether an ability is successful or fails due to the flatcheck.

ignoreConcealed.name: Ignore the concealed condition
ignoreConcealed.hint: If checked, the module ignores the dazzled and concealed conditions.

ignoreGrabbed.name: Ignore the grabbed condition
ignoreGrabbed.hint: If checked, the module ignores the grabbed condition.

ignoreInvisibility.name: Ignore the condition with hidden effects
ignoreInvisibility.hint: If checked, the module ignores the the following conditions: hidden, invisible, undetected and blinded.

ignorePassiveActions.name: Surpress flatchecks of passive actions
ignorePassiveActions.hint: If checked, the module ignores the test from actions with the pf2e passive action symbol.

ignoreReactionActions.name: Surpress flatchecks of reaction actions
ignoreReactionActions.hint: If checked, the module ignores the test from actions with the pf2e reaction action symbol.
